title: Global NAND memory bit market share 2020 , by application
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 6 different Races for 2 groups 2019, and 2020 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 2020 had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Smartphone and 2019 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Other.
In Race Smartphone, 2019 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 6 Races and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Other.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2019 that was found in Race Smartphone was 11.67 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Race Other.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2019, and 2020. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Race Smartphone, 2020 had the highest SOME LABEL 36.0 among the 2 groups and in Other, 2019 had the lowest SOME LABEL 3.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 6 different Races for 2 groups 2019, and 2020 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 2020 had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Smartphone and 2019 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Other.
In Race Smartphone, 2019 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 6 Races and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Other.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2019 that was found in Race Smartphone was 11.67 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Race Other.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 6 different Races for 2 groups 2019, and 2020 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Race Smartphone, 2020 had the highest SOME LABEL 36.0 among the 2 groups and in Other, 2019 had the lowest SOME LABEL 3.0.
In Race Smartphone, 2019 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Race Other out of all 6 Races.
Race Smartphone and Other had the biggest gap of 32.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2019.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of 2019.
Averaging all 2 groups 2019, and 2020, the Race Smartphone is the maximum SOME LABEL and Other is the minimum SOME LABEL.
